name: AIZZA CARIDO
description: Responsible for the overall management of all strategic and operational Marketing and Customer Relationship activities. Provide market feedback to the company leadership regarding competitive offerings, prospect needs and generate product development ideas,.

name: LOUISE SALAS
description: Louise is an experienced blockchain and web developer. He created his first program in c++ at the age of 17. He is a recognized programmer in his alma mater and has received numerous amounts of recognition for his exemplary programming skills. He also kicks ass in Mobile Legends 24/7.

name: JONEIL AYING
description: Joneil is a strong independent woman who is capable of running a business just like how she runs her kids in a sunday morning. Joneil is one of the creators of vue js and has contributed his insights in the development of Ubuntu's new Iteration zesty zapus 17.04.

name: A.R. CASAS
description: RAY is a gaming expert with more than 8 years of experience in PC and Console Games. Over the last year Ray has been focusing in binge playing MOBA games and marathoning classic movies. He occationally performs the Haka before playing ranked matches.  HE SHITS YOU NOT.
